statements: SELECT * FROM employee_information;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE hourly_rate > 15.00;
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Cashier' AND hourly_rate < 10.00;
SELECT full_name, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Server' AND shift_id = '12345';
SELECT employee_id, position FROM employee_information ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, shift_id FROM employee_information ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE hourly_rate BETWEEN 12.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_information;
SELECT MAX(hourly_rate) FROM employee_information;
SELECT MIN(hourly_rate) FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Chef';
SELECT AVG(hourly_rate) FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Server';
SELECT SUM(hourly_rate) FROM employee_information;
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM employee_information;
SELECT full_name, position, shift_id FROM employee_information WHERE position IN ('Manager', 'Cashier');
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE position LIKE 'Ca%';
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position = 'Manager' AND hourly_rate > 20;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_information WHERE hourly_rate BETWEEN 15 AND 30;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE position LIKE '%Associate%';
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE position IN ('Manager', 'Assistant Manager');
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(hourly_rate) AS average_hourly_rate FROM employee_information;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employee_information;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id IN (SELECT shift_id FROM shifts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id = (SELECT shift_id FROM shifts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id = ANY (SELECT shift_id FROM shifts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM shifts WHERE shifts.shift_id = employee_information.shift_id);
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE position = (CASE WHEN shift_id IS NULL THEN 'Manager' ELSE 'Associate' END);
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_information WHERE position = COALESCE((SELECT position FROM managers WHERE managers.employee_id = employee_information.employee_id), 'Employee');
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position IN (SELECT position FROM roles WHERE roles.shift_id = employee_information.shift_id AND roles.type = 'Permanent');

SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position IN (SELECT position FROM roles WHERE roles.shift_id = employee_information.shift_id AND roles.type = 'Intern' AND start_date > '2022-01-01');

SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position IN (SELECT position FROM roles WHERE roles.shift_id = employee_information.shift_id AND roles.type = 'Contractor' AND end_date < '2023-01-01');

SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE position IN (SELECT position FROM roles WHERE roles.shift_id = employee_information.shift_id AND roles.type = 'Volunteer' AND start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31');
SELECT full_name, position, hourly_rate FROM employee_information WHERE shift_id IN (SELECT shift_id FROM shifts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01');
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_start_time > '08:00:00' AND shift_start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate BETWEEN 15 AND 25;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE position != 'Supervisor';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE position IN ('Cashier', 'Associate');
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM employees;
SELECT AVG(hourly_rate) FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT MAX(hourly_rate) FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, hourly_rate FROM employees LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT MIN(hourly_rate), MAX(hourly_rate) FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shifts WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, e.position, s.shift_date, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE e.position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, COUNT(s.shift_id) AS total_shifts FROM employees e LEFT JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, SUM(s.shift_end_time - s.shift_start_time) AS total_hours_worked FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, AVG(s.shift_end_time - s.shift_start_time) AS avg_hours_worked FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, MIN(hourly_rate) AS min_hourly_rate FROM employees e WHERE e.position = 'Cashier';
SELECT e.name, MAX(hourly_rate) AS max_hourly_rate FROM employees e WHERE e.position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, ROUND(AVG(hourly_rate), 2) AS avg_hourly_rate FROM employees e GROUP BY e.position;
SELECT e.name, COUNT(DISTINCT s.shift_date) AS total_shift_days FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, DATE_FORMAT(s.shift_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, TIME_FORMAT(s.shift_start_time, '%H:%i') AS formatted_start_time FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, DATE_ADD(s.shift_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS next_shift_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, CONCAT(e.name, ' - ', s.shift_date) AS shift_info FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time) AS hours_worked FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, GROUP_CONCAT(shift_id) AS all_shift_ids FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT position) AS all_positions FROM employees e GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, IF(e.hourly_rate < 15, 'Low', 'High') AS rate_category FROM employees e;
SELECT e.name, CASE WHEN e.position = 'Manager' THEN 'Management' ELSE 'Staff' END AS position_category FROM employees e;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees;
SELECT department, salary FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM shifts;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date FROM shifts;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM shifts;
SELECT * FROM payroll;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM payroll;
SELECT employee_id, payment_date FROM payroll;
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.department, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.shift_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary FROM employees e LEFT JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time FROM employees e LEFT JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.department, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time FROM employees e LEFT JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.shift_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary FROM employees e RIGHT JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time FROM employees e RIGHT JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.department, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e RIGHT JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT name, position, department, salary FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT e.name, e.position, s.shift_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.salary > 60000;
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.position, SUM(p.salary) AS total_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position;
SELECT e.name, e.department, AVG(p.salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.department;
SELECT e.name, e.position, MAX(p.salary) AS max_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position;
SELECT e.name, e.position, MIN(p.salary) AS min_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position;
SELECT e.name, e.position, COUNT(p.payroll_id) AS num_payments FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position;
SELECT e.name, e.department, COUNT(s.shift_id) AS num_shifts FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.department;
SELECT e.name, e.department, AVG(DATEDIFF(s.end_time, s.start_time)) AS avg_shift_duration FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.department;
SELECT e.name, e.department, MAX(DATEDIFF(s.end_time, s.start_time)) AS max_shift_duration FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.department;
SELECT e.name, e.position, MIN(DATEDIFF(s.end_time, s.start_time)) AS min_shift_duration FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.position;
SELECT e.position, COUNT(p.payroll_id) AS num_payments, AVG(p.salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.position;
SELECT e.department, COUNT(s.shift_id) AS num_shifts, MAX(s.shift_date) AS latest_shift_date FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.department;
SELECT e.position, COUNT(s.shift_id) AS num_shifts, MIN(s.shift_date) AS earliest_shift_date FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.position;
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.salary, p.payment_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, e.position, s.shift_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e RIGHT JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT name, position FROM employees
SELECT * FROM shifts
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts
SELECT * FROM payroll
SELECT pay_date, total_pay FROM payroll
SELECT * FROM schedule
SELECT employee_id, shift_id, date FROM schedule
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT shift_id, shift_date FROM shifts WHERE shift_date >= CURRENT_DATE
SELECT employee_id, name, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20
SELECT payroll_id, hours_worked, total_pay FROM payroll WHERE hours_worked < 40
SELECT employee_id, shift_id, date FROM schedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM employees
SELECT shift_id, shift_date FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees LIMIT 5
SELECT count(*) FROM employees
SELECT MAX(hours_worked) AS max_hours_worked FROM payroll
SELECT AVG(hourly_rate) AS avg_hourly_rate FROM employees
SELECT SUM(total_pay) AS total_pay FROM payroll
SELECT * FROM employees UNION SELECT * FROM shifts
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20.00;
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, p.pay_date, p.hours_worked, p.total_pay FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT s.shift_id, e.name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM schedule s JOIN employees e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT s.schedule_id, e.name, sh.start_time, sh.end_time FROM schedule s JOIN employees e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN shifts sh ON s.shift_id = sh.shift_id;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, p.pay_date AS payment_date, p.total_pay AS payment_amount FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, sh.shift_date, sh.start_time, sh.end_time FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id;
SELECT MAX(hourly_rate) AS max_hourly_rate FROM employees;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, COUNT(*) AS shift_count FROM employees e JOIN schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, SUM(p.total_pay) AS total_pay FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, AVG(p.hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, sh.start_time, sh.end_time, SUM(p.total_pay) AS total_payment FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, sh.start_time, sh.end_time;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, SUM(p.total_pay) AS total_payment FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE sh.shift_date = '2022-05-10' GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, sh.start_time, sh.end_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, sh.start_time, sh.end_time) AS shift_duration FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, SUM(p.total_pay) AS total_payment FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE sh.shift_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-10' GROUP BY e.name;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, COUNT(*) AS shift_count, AVG(p.hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM employees e JOIN schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.position, AVG(p.total_pay) AS avg_pay FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.position;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, SUM(p.total_pay) AS total_payment FROM employees e JOIN shifts sh ON e.employee_id = sh.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE sh.shift_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-10' GROUP BY e.name HAVING total_payment > 1000.00;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, COUNT(*) AS shift_count, AVG(p.hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM employees e JOIN schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING avg_hours_worked > 30.00;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM shifts;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM payroll;
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, amount FROM payroll WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT name FROM departments WHERE department_id=1;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT employees.name, shifts.shift_date, shifts.start_time, shifts.end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;

SELECT employees.name, schedules.schedule_date, shifts.shift_date FROM employees INNER JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id INNER JOIN shifts ON schedules.shift_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, amount FROM payroll ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, AVG(amount) AS avg_pay FROM payroll INNER JOIN employees ON payroll.employee_id = employees.employee_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT name, position, shift_date FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id WHERE shift_date >= '2022-10-15';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees UNION SELECT name, position FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT shift_date, start_time FROM shifts WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department='HR');
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, amount FROM payroll WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (SELECT department_id FROM employees WHERE position='Manager');
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, shift_id FROM schedules WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department='IT');
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT name, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, amount FROM payroll WHERE pay_date >= '2022-01-01' AND pay_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT department_id, name FROM departments WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM employees);
SELECT employee_id, name, position, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1);
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE start_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT department_id, name FROM departments LEFT JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.department_id;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR' OR department='Finance';
SELECT pay_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payroll GROUP BY pay_date;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, shift_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count, department FROM employees GROUP BY department;

SELECT name, position, department, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id INNER JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-03-15');
